layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x579
      LayoutBlockFlow {PRE} at (0,0) size 304x36 [border: (2px solid #008000)]
        LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 96x32
          text run at (2,2) width 88: "This should"
          text run at (90,2) width 0: " "
          text run at (2,18) width 96: "not justify."
          text run at (98,18) width 0: " "
